flawed_nl_solution:
After losing some socks, Caroline has 40 - 4 = <<40-4=40>>40 pairs of socks
Caroline donates 40 * (2/3) = <<40*2/3=80/3>>80/3 pairs of socks to the thrift store
After donating some socks, Caroline has 40 - 80/3 = <<40-80/3=40/3>>40/3 pairs of socks remaining
After getting new socks, Caroline has 40/3 + 10 + 3 = <<40/3+10+3=79/3>>79/3 pairs of socks
#### 79/3

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 36, not 40. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
